verbose_text: In vitro studies by Qui et al. [XREF_BIBR] on purified acid sphingomyelinase suggest a direct oxidation of the acid sphingomyelinase at cysteine residue 629 with a subsequent copper promoted dimerisation of the acid sphingomyelinase [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: acid sphingomyelinase at cysteine residue 629 with a subsequent copper-promoted dimerisation
